text: Century Child is the fourth album by the Finnish symphonic metal group Nightwish. == Track listing == # Bless the Child – 6.12 # End of All Hope – 3.55 # Dead to the World – 4.19 # Ever Dream – 4.43 # Slaying the Dreamer – 4.31 # Forever Yours – 3.50 # Ocean Soul – 4.14 # Feel for You – 3.55 # The Phantom of the Opera – 4.10 # Beauty of the Beast – 10.21 == Personnel == * Tarja Turunen – vocals * Tuomas Holopainen – keyboards * Emppu Vuorinen – guitars * Marco Hietala – bass guitar * Jukka Nevalainen – drums Category:2002 albums
title: Century Child
